DOC.brief_summary: The objective study collect OCT measurement data normal healthy eye order determine reference limit Topcon 3D OCT-1 Maestro base percentile point 1 % , 5 % , 95 % , 99 % .
DOC.brief_title: Topcon 3D OCT-1 Maestro Reference Database Study II
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study collect OCT measurement data normal healthy eye order determine reference limit Topcon 3D OCT-1 Maestro base percentile point 1 % , 5 % , 95 % , 99 % .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Normal Group 1 . Subjects 18 year age old date inform consent 2 . Subjects able understand write informed consent willing participate evidence signing inform consent 3 . Subjects present site normal eye ( eye without pathology ) 4. lOP < = 21 mmHg bilaterally 5 . BCVA 20/40 better ( eye ) 6 . Both eye must free eye disease Exclusion Criteria Normal Group 1 . Subjects previously enrol either Maestro AP study Maestro2 study 2 . Subjects unable tolerate ophthalmic imaging 3 . Subject ocular medium sufficiently clear obtain acceptable OCT image 4 . HFA visual field ( 242 Sita Standard , white white ) result unreliable ( base manufacturer 's recommendation ) , define fixation loss > 20 % false positives > 33 % , false negative > 33 % 5 . Visual field defect consistent glaucomatous optic nerve damage base least one follow two finding : On pattern deviation ( PD ) , exist cluster 3 point expect location visual field depress 5 % level , least 1 depressed 1 % level ; Glaucoma hemifield test `` outside normal limit . '' 6 . Presence ocular pathology except cataract 7 . Narrow angle 8 . History leukemia , dementia multiple sclerosis 9 . Concomitant use hydroxychloroquine chloroquine
